channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Quite a large dip in the grass verge, 24th July
item.description:
Outside between number 23 and 25 grass verge needs a large amount of soil put in it to make it level
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tobyfield Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Pothole in road., 24th July
item.description:
Pothole in road, on southbound side, in line with off side tyres. Deep and hard to spot, nasty jolt to the car.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 39, Hales Road, Battledown, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: White line needs repainting outside alley, 24th July
item.description:
The white line marking the alleyway outside 40 Croft Gardens has faded. Cars repeatedly park over the line and block the alleyway. This makes it difficult for residents who park up the alley to exit. Please repaint the lines

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Croft Gardens, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road marking and stud issues

item.title: Drain surround is substantially damaged and likely to collapse., 24th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2-4, Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury

item.title: 3 ash trees at side of my house, 24th July
item.description:
Please would you inspect the 3 ash trees at the side of my property at 1 hartlebury way,charlton kings gl52 6yb. the trees are on the road verge of glenfall way and have branches which overhang my property.the tree closest to my house has been trimmed before.all of them are continually loosing branch ends which drop on our roof and garden.i am worried that my house could be damaged by the trees which are now quite old.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Hartlebury Way, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Ash Tree located on Highway land
